atbat.des: Vladimir Guerrero singles on a ground ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Matt Wieters pops out to shortstop Derek Jeter.
Mark Reynolds doubles (25) on a fly ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Vladimir Guerrero to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Freddy Garcia had Mark Reynolds down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Robert Andino singles on a line drive to left fielder Brett Gardner. Vladimir Guerrero scores. Mark Reynolds to 3rd.

action.des: With Ryan Adams batting, passed ball by Russell Martin, Mark Reynolds scores. Robert Andino to 2nd.

atbat.des: Ryan Adams singles on a line drive to right fielder Andruw Jones. Robert Andino to 3rd.
Kyle Hudson reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by first baseman Mark Teixeira. Robert Andino scores. Ryan Adams to 2nd.
J. Hardy singles on a ground ball to left fielder Brett Gardner. Ryan Adams scores. Kyle Hudson to 2nd.
Nick Markakis flies out to left fielder Brett Gardner.
Adam Jones strikes out swinging.
Jesus Montero walks.
Brett Gardner called out on strikes.
Derek Jeter doubles (21) on a fly ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Jesus Montero to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Brian Matusz had Derek Jeter down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson doubles (21) on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis. Jesus Montero scores. Derek Jeter scores.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Chris Jakubauskas replaces Brian Matusz.

atbat.des: Mark Teixeira walks.

pitch.cc: Chris Jakubauskas is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Paul Emmel.

atbat.des: Alex Rodriguez hit by pitch. Curtis Granderson to 3rd. Mark Teixeira to 2nd.
Robinson Cano hits a grand slam (24) to right center field. Curtis Granderson scores. Mark Teixeira scores. Alex Rodriguez scores.

pitch.cc: That was pitch number 15 for Chris Jakubauskas; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .277 average in the first 15 pitches but they hit .304 off him after that.

atbat.des: Andruw Jones walks.
Russell Martin doubles (16) on a sharp ground ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Andruw Jones to 3rd.
Jesus Montero strikes out swinging.
Brett Gardner grounds out, second baseman Ryan Adams to first baseman Mark Reynolds.

pitch.cc: Chris Jakubauskas showed faith in Matt Wieters by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
